phrases: Here is a get well gift...
And you remembered my favorite flowers!
I am sorry to call you here so suddenly.
I read in the paper that the choir group
took first place in nationals again this year.
It is not called the choir group anymore.
Are you enjoying your shopping experience?
Holy, he really went out there.
I am a heroine, I am a heroine, I am a heroine!
From the ordinary to the extraordinary.
We have got everything you need!
I am going to need everyone is full cooperation, even those who are busy.
You are going to get beat.
We will not let you lay a finger on the merchandise!
is the best in the world!
We will get you for this, WestStoprangers!
We have protected the Western Shopping District's peace!
we will hold a 30 minute sale, starting now.
Say the code word for 10 off!
Please read this flyer for more information.
We passed out a lot of flyers, too.
But we can do so much better!
Our tempo and timing were subpar.
Who can we get to take his place?
who will protect the peace of the shopping district?
I cannot let myself be defeated!
We will be back again tomorrow, somewhere in this shopping district!
We have protected the Western Shopping District's peace!
We are the Western Shopping District Heroes!
Oh boy, can you believe it?
They say I make a perfect villain.
I am sorry to let you down like this.
Thanks to you, today was a huge success.
you guys would consider extending our agreement?
We have the White Festival coming up.
It is not like you practice every day, right?
But we have barely done anything to get ready.
Like, would not it would be hard for you to write
So she needs time to figure the song out...
If you want to do it, it is fine with me.
I can get that song written in no time!
Shiho-san's done a lot for us,
so it would be rude to just brush her off.
It is not like you have finished anything
I am happy to keep going,
but could we maybe have some time to think it over?
If you want to know more about composition,
you should talk to the vice principal.
The song on that cassette tape
was co-written by her and your mom.
We will now sing a song
born between Nao and me, and nurtured by our choir.
come to the staff room, please.
Maybe it is about the WestStoprangers.
I saw some girls from the choral group watching the show.
When she is set on something,
she will spin things any way that suits her.
If this is about the choir club, concerns us, too.
So you are all aware, then,
that after school jobs are strictly forbidden.
I should not have to remind you
to conduct yourselves as students at all times.
We were totally acting like students!
What am I going to do with you...
Everything we did, we did with your permission.
Um, we would like your stamp of approval...
That was before you explained what you would be doing.
I do not believe that makes a difference.
The shopping district's customers liked our act.
We will be using our pay for the White Festival.
I fail to see the problem.
I will let it go only if you quit immediately,
Do not you think going back on something you have already approved
Our club fully intends to finish its job.
for telling her you will not abandon the WestStoprangers.
I figured it would be all over if we were ordered to stop.
Once I got into the role of Curry Yellow,
I forget what you call this...
Long ago, a very poor man named Ted
borrowed his best friend's only coat, named Deb.
By clothing his friend Ted with Deb the coat, he coined the term in-deb-ted.
It is a touching tale of priceless friendship!
I definitely need to share this with January
I know one about flipping your debts.
I was thinking something like ta-ri-ra-rira!
But that is not what you sang before.
Is your name read as Naoko or Naomi?
Your first name, I mean, Madam Vice President.
But my mother called you Nao, right?
Your mother and I belonged to the same club in high school.
That is what we called it back then.
Wait, did you ever visit my mother in the hospital?
Your mother wanted to see me, so I went one time.
If you are wondering why I did not tell you that
it is because I must respect the rules of this school.
No matter what happened in the past,
you are currently nothing more than one of my students.
I will treat you no better nor worse than any other.
Then what do you want from me?
I would like to ask you
how my mother went about writing songs.
You two wrote that song together, right?
I am trying to finish a song of hers...
How should I go about it?
It does not come naturally to me, like it does for you...
Music is about having fun with sound!
You have got to have fun!
Because you are not enjoying yourself.
You cannot do it if you think you have to.
A song is something that flows naturally
from the depths of your heart.
In any case, I would appreciate it if you would not
waste my time with such petty concerns.
I would like to write a song with my daughter.
Just like you and I did.
Maybe if she is accepted to your school,
and joins the choir club, she could be with you
It is the choral group now.
That song, and the original club,
I am glad I could see you one last time.
It seems I am not going to make it.
Some no-name group's album is not worth a dime.
B-But this is a special edition and it is autographed!
I thought we could sell it for our festival fund...
I mean, we cannot keep doing this after school job thing forever.
I was in a bad mood the other day
and I lashed out at you.
When I said it was rude to reject Shiho-san.
We will figure out what to do about the festival together.
it would be like the vice principal won.
We can handle the White Festival and a job!
No, I was more pumping myself up.
And I will get the song done.
Do not forget to get the script checked.
Getting a lot of energy from Yellow.
in front of the Japanese sweets shop.
A true hero does not have the choice to give up!
I have been busy lately protecting the world's peace
as an inheritor of Gamba Red's will.
Thankfully, I have four trustworthy friends at my side,
and they are warriors imbued with the same passion for justice.
Like everyone, a defender of justice has his share of rough times,
but I refuse to get discouraged!
You did not just steal a bag back there!
That is a proud symbol of Yellow's dedication to her fri
With beads of sweat gleaming in the light,
we reach for the future in front of us!
We are scared, but that is why we will never give up!
We do not want to regret anything!
The dreams we are chasing will not be easily destroyed!
So we will take hold of it right now!
That moment where we can truly shine!
Gamgam, we will fulfill our duty!
What is wrong with you people?!
We are the Western Shopping District Heroes!
Wherever you are, I am sure you are working hard,
I believe I will be able to give these letters to you someday,
so I will keep on writing them.
I want to play someone old.
This was originally Wakana and her mother's song.
